omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "controlWidth" : 12, "disOnTplt" : false, "elementValueMap" : { "BillingAccountId" : "=IF(%AccountRecordType% == 'Business',%BillingProfileDetails:BillingAccountProfile:AccountId%,%AccountId%)", "ContactInfo" : "=IF(%ContactId% == NULL, %AccountDetail:ContactId%, %ContactId%)" }, "label" : "SetBillingAccountvalue", "message" : { }, "pubsub" : false, "show" : null, "showPersistentComponent" : [ false, false ], "ssm" : false, "wpm" : false }
